meanings.definition: Signed by the author or creator
meanings.sent1: The autographed book had the author's signature on the cover.
meanings.sent2: I cherish my autographed poster from the concert.
meanings.sent3: The autographed baseball was so special, it made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her autographed painting brought life to the room.
meanings.sent5: The autographed photograph was a prized possession.

meanings.definition: To sign one's name on something, typically as a gesture of approval or endorsement.
meanings.sent1: She autographed the fan's t-shirt at the event.
meanings.sent2: He autographed the album for his biggest fan.
meanings.sent3: The cat 'autographed' the carpet with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: The artist autographed the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The tree autographed the ground with its falling leaves.
